Description: Fragment of oval handle at neck join of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine red-brown; cream slip. Circular stamp with rose symbol.
Production date: 170 BC (see N. Badoud, Le temps de Rhodes, 2015, 142.)
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (95)
